casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Marshall HAMMETT. No. 83A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 21, 2006. Kelly L. Sandling, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of September 2006 by Defendant for Leave to File a Supplemental Brief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of September 2006."
